reviewText:
The feature was more about bondage than latex. They should've called it "Bondage Love" or something...

The scene on the front cover is the best latex scene, everything else falls short in my opion. The DVD itself has quite a few extras and a couple bonus scenes that aren't that great, but it's rare to see interviews with the stars on the DVD they're in.

Worth a viewing, and then you can probably move on...
